description: Timeless, durable and really comfortable – Vardag Shorts use Fjallraven's G-1000 Lite Eco Stretch for extra freedom of movement on your summer outings. The patch hand pockets and leg pocket give them a characteristic look, and there are two back pockets as well. Their simple aesthetics make them just as suitable for casual workdays in the city as for weekend hikes or summer beach parties.
name: Fjallraven Vardag Lite Shorts - Mens
